properties.name: com.pbatchis.miniblog.jwtExpirationMs
properties.description: The expiration period in milliseconds of a JWT token.

properties.name: com.pbatchis.miniblog.jwtSecretKey
properties.description: The secret key used for the JWT encoding.

properties.name: com.pbatchis.miniblog.jwtSignatureAlgorithm
properties.description: Name of the signature algorithm to use in generating a JWT token.
